focusedAbilities.desc: Three times per turn, after you deal damage to an enemy, give them 2 Burning tokens.

fusedAbilities.desc: Three times per turn, after you deal damage to an enemy, give them 1 Burning token.

franticAbilities.desc: Until your next turn, three times per turn, after you deal damage to an enemy, give them 2 Burning tokens.

actions.name: Incinerate
actions.desc:
Deal 1 damage and give 1 Burning token to an enemy within range.
5+: Deal 2 damage and give 2 Burning tokens instead.
8+: Deal 3 damage and give 3 Burning tokens instead.

alphaSuper.name: Erupting Burning Fist
alphaSuper.desc: Deal 4 damage and Push 4 to an adjacent enemy, then give them Burning Tokens until they hold 6.

deltaSuper.name: Watch The World Burn
deltaSuper.desc: Place a Trap under each enemy you can see, then give each of those enemies 2 Burning tokens and 3 Fatigue tokens.
